definition: to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)

sentences.english: However, since her return, Chapman has become something of a national hero.
sentences.chinese: 但是，自查普曼歸國後，她幾乎已是民族英雄。

sentences.english: But does this prove that Chapman is cashing in?
sentences.chinese: 但是這就能證明查普曼在牟利嗎？

sentences.english: Chapman joke is the "spy row" opened her "good life.
sentences.chinese: 查普曼笑談是“間諜風波”開啓了她的“美好生活”。

sentences.english: There appears to be some question over whether Chapman was paid for the session.
sentences.chinese: 這裏似乎涉及到查普曼是否因此而得利的問題。

sentences.english: In a friendly, often humorous style, he unpacks each one.
sentences.chinese: 查普曼博士以親切幽默的方式爲你一一講解。

sentences.english: Chapman illustrates each love language with real-life examples from his counseling practice.
sentences.chinese: 查普曼博士將從真實生活中選取事例來輔助讀者理解。

definition: Burns (name)/Nicholas Burns (1956-), US diplomat, Under-secretary at US State Department from 2005
Milton (name)/John Milton (1608-1674), English republican writer and poet, author of Paradise Lost
O'Connor (name)/Thomas Power O'Connor (1848-1929), Irish journalist and nationalist political leader
